an8.86:5.1: ekaccā nayimassa → ekaccā imassa (?) | assu → idaṁ padaṁ katthaci | akicchalābhiniyo → nikāmalābhiniyo akicchalābhiniyo (?)
an8.86:5.2: Tumhākampi → tāsampi (?) | anuyuttānaṁ viharataṁ → anuyutte viharante disvā (?)
an8.86:5.3: na hi nūname → naha nūna me (bj, sya-all, pts1ed) | assu → idaṁ padaṁ katthaci
an8.86:8.3: imaṁ → idānimaṁ (katthaci) | upaṭṭhahissati → paccessati (bj); saccessati (pts1ed); upaṭṭhahati (mr) | Taṁ tamhā → so taṁ tamhā (?)
an8.86:12.1: Idha panāhaṁ, nāgita … → etthantare pāṭho (an8.86:12.1–an8.86:14.1) an6.42 chakkanipāteyeva dissati, na ettha
